mdRecord.dcterms:title: Air du Roi Louis XIII: Amaryllis : op. 261 / [arranged] for the guitar by W.L. Hayden
Amaryllis
Beaujoyeulx, Baltasar de, -approximately 1587. Ballet comique de la royne. Clochette; arr
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Beaujoyeulx, Baltasar de, -approximately 1587
Hayden, W. L. (Winslow L.)
Louis XIII, King of France, 1601-1643
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Erroneously attributed to Louis XIII under the title of Amaryllis, but really by Baltasar de Beaujoyeulx. Cf. Elson. Folk songs of many nations. p. 142.
Advertisement on p. [6]: "The history of thirteen valuable, or invaluable, music-books!"
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Gems of the season / arranged for the guitar by W.L. Hayden
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Guitar music, Arranged
